meanings.definition: The act of moving troops or equipment into position for military action.
meanings.sent1: The army's deployment was swift and strategic.
meanings.sent2: The general planned the deployment of soldiers for the upcoming mission.
meanings.sent3: During the training exercise, the deployment of toy soldiers was unexpectedly hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The deployment of resources in the battle resembled a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The deployment of troops was crucial for the success of the operation.

meanings.definition: The distribution or arrangement of resources or personnel for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The company's deployment of funds was carefully managed.
meanings.sent2: The deployment of staff to different departments was efficient.
meanings.sent3: The deployment of snacks at the party was a big hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The deployment of tasks among team members was well-balanced.
meanings.sent5: The deployment of supplies to the remote area was challenging but necessary.

meanings.definition: The release or installation of software or technology for use.
meanings.sent1: The deployment of the new app was eagerly anticipated by users.
meanings.sent2: The IT team handled the deployment of the software seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The deployment of updates caused excitement among tech enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The deployment of the latest technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The deployment of the system upgrade improved efficiency across the organization.
